// First we need to import axios.js
import axios from'axios';// Next we make an 'instance' of it
var instance=axios.create({// .. where we make our configurations
baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_AXIOS_BASEURL});// Where you would set stuff like your 'Authorization' header, etc ...
instance.defaults.headers.common['Authorization']='AUTH TOKEN FROM INSTANCE';// Also add/ configure interceptors && all the other cool stuff
instance.interceptors.request.use(function(request){console.log(request);// Edit request config
return request;},function(error){console.log(error);return Promise.reject(error);});instance.interceptors.response.use(function(response){console.log(response);// Edit response config
return response;},function(error){console.log(error);return Promise.reject(error);});export default instance;
